item.title: Water well drilling rig for home use
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hcvtMCJ4eU8 This water well drilling rig is our hot sale, which is suitable for drilling for home or farm, it is very easy to operate and two man can handle it easily. if you have interest, please visit us, http://www.akldrill.com. or contact me directly, 0086 15137425291. akldrill@gmail.com https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tovK5CM_KWA Drilling the well of the house produced by the kit. Drilling of the well took about 3-4 hours. It was worth it. The capacity of the well is 45L in 30 minutes.
